name: SWITCH
description: SWITCH is a power system model, focused on renewables integration. It can identify which generator and transmission projects to build in order to satisfy electricity demand at the lowest cost over a several-year period.

SDGs.evidenceText: This project will substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.
SWITCH makes hourly decisions about how much power to generate from each dispatchable power plant, store at each pumped hydro facility, or transfer along each transmission interconnector.
Access to energy is a basic service to meet basic needs such as safe and healthy cooking and indoor and outdoor lighting in the evening.
Help reduce greenhouse gas emission effect
